name: Dine with a Local
description: Dine with a local and get to know Chicago first-hand while enjoying a "home-cooked" meal (I might cook a few of my soon-to-be world famous AggRolls) or a "Chicago favorites" meal. Chicago Hot Dogs, Italian Beef or Legendary Deep Dish Pizza? Can't decide? Try them all and save room for dessert!  You'll get an insight on Chicago's well known food establishments as well as small artisans creating delicious innovative dishes.
